page_content: The page discusses road closures for an event called 'Slow Up Albula 2008.'
The page provides information on traffic regulations for the Engadin Skimarathon event held on March 11, 2001.
The page discusses the issue of housing availability and affordability, particularly in tourism regions, and the impact of the Zweitwohnungsgesetz (Second Home Law).
The page provides guidelines and downloads for SofTax NP software, which is used for income and wealth tax declarations.
The page focuses on traffic education for 1st and 2nd-grade students, covering topics like pedestrian rules and bicycle safety.
The page informs about the annual siren test in Switzerland and mentions the Alertswiss-App for emergency notifications.
